name: Hanmer Apartments

reviews.text: My son and I stayed here for one night and really liked it. Warm, comfortable quiet and all the modern conveniences that travellers need. It really isn't that far from the village and on a pleasant day the walk would be lovely and riding around on the bikes would be a great way to see more of Hanmer.
reviews.title: Very comfortable

reviews.text: What can i say?
reviews.title: Excellent standard and good value

reviews.text: Apartment lovely, modern, warm. Service lovely modern and warm!
reviews.title: Restful, modern and welcoming

reviews.text: Good value for the high standard.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: You would ideally need a car to get into town (2 min drive) but they do offer a shuttle service.
reviews.title: Quick get-away

reviews.text: We stayed with our two young children (2 brm apartment) and had so much space it was unbelievable! Fabulous play area for the kids to run around in (within view of the apartment so we could keep an eye on them). Super friendly hosts, who were happy to recommend anything we needed. Close to the Hot Springs.
reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we had been travelling around for a week it was great to have the kitchen where we could cook and eat a meal without having to go out. Bathroom was spectactular!
reviews.title: Amy and Shane know their stuff!

reviews.text: We have highly recommended to all friends/family and would love to come back someday!
reviews.title: Great, helpful and superb value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks :)
reviews.title: Greatly exceeds expectations.

reviews.text: This was a great experience. Free shuttle service to the restaurants in town. Amy and Shane know all about ALL the local attractions and especially the restaurants. Great views to the surrounding mountains. Clean and spacious. Will definitely go back.
reviews.title: Perfect Family Retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent host, excellent room.A good view of the mountains the backyard. The room was warm, clean, quiet and modern. Highly recommended................................................................
reviews.title: Best Accommodation in Hanmer Spring

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A lovely small complex with very friendly, helpful owners. We had a gorgeous view of the mountains and our room was warm, clean and lovely and modern. The shuttle into the village at night was great. Nothing to fault. We will definitely be back and have already recommended Hanmer Apartments to others. Thank you Susan & Kent
reviews.title: Fab Accommodation

reviews.text: Modern, clean and good value - well done Hanmer apartments. Also liked the fact you are family owned and you never know who is going to serve you! The area is quiet on the outskirts of Hanmer which means we all could get some sleep but not too far that we couldn't walk to the hot pools if we wanted. Cheers
reviews.title: Our Stay
Perfect....
reviews.text: A lovely place to stay for our first family holiday... Perfect having a cot for our wee one!...... clean, modern, spacious... Stunning views and lovely service!
Very relaxing and peaceful surrounds.... Close to everything...
reviews.title: Relaxing, friendly and great for family

reviews.text: A wonderful place to stay, clean, safe and warm. Close to the golf course so perfect for our stay and the in-room massages were a real delight, and highly recommended.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: the beds were comfortable and the service was outstanding, very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Easy Modern Apartment

reviews.text: We would definately stay again and would recommend the Hanmer Apartments to anyone.
reviews.title: Very Relaxing

reviews.text: Perfect for families too.
reviews.title: fantastic place to stay - Hanmer Apartments

reviews.text: Thank you for such a wonderful experience in picturesque Hanmer Springs.
reviews.title: Great Stay

description: Four exclusive brand new (4+ star) self contained 2 bedroom apartments. FREE WIFI, FREE bike hire, FREE towels for pools, FREE DVD hire, FREE shuttle into town (1.5km away) in evenings. Inclusive of heat pump / air conditioning, electric blankets, SKY TV & Freeview, queen & king / twin beds, fully equipped kitchenette with benchtop oven, electric frypan, microwave oven, kettle & toaster. Patio with BBQ facilities and magnificent alpine views. Boutique, without the price tag. Relax and unwind in our spacious apartments.
